p: The present study revealed both aqueous and methanol extracts of F. sur possessed diuretic and natriuretic activities. The present finding, therefore, supports the traditional claim of the plant as a diuretic agent. The urinary PH and electrolytes analysis results hint that the extracts to have multiple modes of action. The safety profile of the extract was an added advantage that calls for conducting further research to ascertain the findings reported in this study.
